original_text:
Buffalo
Una fantastica avventura con la slot machine Buffalo
Gioca con Buffalo, la slot machine che ti porterà alla scoperta delle praterie dell’America settentrionale e dei suoi abitanti. Questo titolo è prodotto dalla Aristocrat, storica e innovativa casa di sviluppo software impegnata da tanti anni nel settore delle slot machine e dei casinò virtuali, capace di creare giochi dall’alto indice di gradimento. Attraverso la slot Buffalo potrai vivere una indimenticabile avventura percorrendo le praterie del Nord America insieme agli animali tipici che abitano queste zone. Il Bisonte americano, uno degli animali che ha rischiato l’estinzione durante il periodo di colonizzazione da parte degli europei, è il protagonista di questo gioco. Oltre a dare il nome alla slot, è anche il simbolo più remunerativo del gioco; grazie alle 1024 linee di pagamento presenti in questa macchina, non sarà difficile riuscire a crea delle ottime combinazioni vincenti.
Grafica della slot machine
In questa slot le icone raffiguranti gli animali sono disegnate con molta cura e attenzione nei dettagli; la Aristocrat conferma ancora una volta la propria volontà nel realizzare prodotti dagli elevati standard qualitativi, progettati per piacere e per far divertire il proprio pubblico. I simboli presenti nella slot rappresentano i più iconici animali che popolano i territori del Nord America. Oltre alle lettere e ai numeri J, Q, K, A, 9 e 10 presi in prestito dalla cultura dei giochi con le carte, troverai: un Bisonte, una Pantera, un’Aquila Reale, un Alce e un Lupo Bianco. I simboli speciali sono rappresentati da una Moneta d’oro, necessaria per attivare il bonus game, e da un Paesaggio al Tramonto che ricopre la funzione di simbolo Wild.
Le funzioni e i bonus della slot
Come abbiamo già accennato, questa slot mette a tua disposizione fino a 1024 linee di pagamento, 5 rulli da 4 simboli ognuno; un numero così elevato di linee ti permetterà di creare diverse combinazioni vincenti con maggiore facilità. Il simbolo Wild della slot, il Paesaggio al Tramonto, compare esclusivamente sui rulli 2, 3 e 4 e, come sempre, verrà in tuo aiuto per completare al meglio le combinazioni non andate a buon fine. L’icona Scatter invece, la Moneta D’oro, ha la facoltà di comparire in qualunque posizione sui rulli e grazie a 3, 4 o 5 di questi simboli, avrai l’opportunità di accedere al bonus game della slot machine. In base al numero di Scatter potrai avere da 5 fino a 20 Free Spin iniziali, con la possibilità di riattivarli all’infinito se ulteriori simboli con la Moneta D’oro compariranno durante il loro svolgimento. Hai inoltre a disposizione diversi moltiplicatori nel corso delle giocate gratuite; se compariranno dei simboli Wild infatti, avrai un moltiplicatore variabile x2 o x3 che si sommerà alle tue vincite. In ultimo, puoi sfidare la fortuna tentando di raddoppiare o quadruplicare il valore della puntata appena vinta, cercando di indovinare il seme o il colore di una carta coperta, attraverso la funzione Gamble della slot machine.
Slot simili a Buffalo
La slot machine Buffalo è un gioco davvero affascinante, ricco di moltiplicatori e con un buon bonus per i Free Spin. Grazie all’elevato numero di linee a disposizione, questo gioco può garantirti un numero continuo di vincite e un costante divertimento. Frogs and Flies e Lost Temple di produzione Aristocrat, sono due slot machine che si avvicinano a questa tipologia di meccaniche di gioco; entrambe infatti mettono a tua disposizione 1024 linee di gioco come in Buffalo.

raw_translation.response:
Buffalo
Experience a thrilling adventure with the slot machine Buffalo. Explore the vast prairies of North America and its native inhabitants with Aristocrat's innovative and historic software development. The game's protagonist, the American bison, is not only the name of the slot, but also the highest paying symbol. With 1024 pay lines, creating winning combinations has never been so easy.

Slot Machine Graphics
The game's animal symbols are carefully crafted with attention to detail. Aristocrat confirms its commitment to creating high quality products that entertain and delight audiences. Besides the icons borrowed from card games, such as letters and numbers J, Q, K, A, 9, and 10, you will also find iconic North American animals such as the bison, panther, eagle, elk, and white wolf. The special symbols include a gold coin, which activates the bonus game, and a sunset landscape that serves as the wild symbol.

Slot Features and Bonuses
With up to 1024 pay lines and 5 reels, each with 4 symbols, creating winning combinations is even easier. The wild symbol, the sunset landscape, only appears on reels 2, 3, and 4 and helps complete any unsuccessful combinations. The scatter symbol, the gold coin, can appear anywhere on the reels. Getting 3, 4, or 5 of these symbols will activate the slot machine's bonus game. Depending on the number of scatter symbols, you may receive from 5 to 20 initial free spins and an unlimited number of free spins during the game. Also, the game offers several multipliers throughout the free spins. If wild symbols appear, you will receive a varying multiplier of x2 or x3 added to your winnings. Lastly, you can try doubling or quadrupling your winnings by guessing the color or suit of a facedown card through the gamble feature.

Similar Slots to Buffalo
With an abundance of pay lines, you'll enjoy plenty of opportunities to win and have fun playing Buffalo. Aristocrat's Frogs and Flies and Lost Temple are two slot machines also offering 1024 pay lines and similar gameplay as Buffalo.

raw_translation.response:
Experience an unforgettable adventure with the Buffalo slot machine. Produced by Aristocrat, a historical and innovative software development house committed to the slot machine and online casino industry. This game will take you on a journey through the American prairies, where you will encounter the typical animals that inhabit these areas. The American Bison, an animal that has been on the brink of extinction during European colonization, is the main character of the game and the highest-paying symbol. With 1024 paylines, you will have no trouble creating excellent winning combinations.

The graphics of the game are meticulously designed, highlighting the attention to detail Aristocrat invests in ensuring high-quality products that are fun and entertaining. The symbols in the slot are iconic animals that populate the North American territories, including a bison, panther, eagle, elk, and white wolf. Special symbols include a golden coin, required to activate the bonus game, and a sunset landscape that serves as the wild symbol.

Buffalo offers up to 1024 paylines and five reels with four symbols each, making it easier to create winning combinations. The wild symbol, Sunset Landscape, will appear on reels 2, 3, and 4 to complete any unsuccessful combinations. The scatter, the Golden Coin, can appear anywhere on the reels, granting you access to the bonus game with three, four, or five coins. Depending on the number of scatters, you can have 5 to 20 free initial spins, which can be infinitely reactivated if additional gold coins appear during their execution. You also have several multipliers during free spins, as the wild symbol will give you a variable multiplier of x2 or x3 that adds to your winnings. And lastly, you can try your luck by doubling or quadrupling your bet by guessing the color or suit of a hidden card through the slot's Gamble feature.

Buffalo is a fascinating game full of multipliers and a good bonus for free spins, thanks to the high number of paylines. Other Aristocrat games with similar mechanics include Frogs and Flies and Lost Temple, both of which offer 1024 paylines like Buffalo.

message.content:
Experience an unforgettable adventure with the Buffalo slot machine. Produced by Aristocrat, a historical and innovative software development house committed to the slot machine and online casino industry. This game will take you on a journey through the American prairies, where you will encounter the typical animals that inhabit these areas. The American Bison, an animal that has been on the brink of extinction during European colonization, is the main character of the game and the highest-paying symbol. With 1024 paylines, you will have no trouble creating excellent winning combinations.

The graphics of the game are meticulously designed, highlighting the attention to detail Aristocrat invests in ensuring high-quality products that are fun and entertaining. The symbols in the slot are iconic animals that populate the North American territories, including a bison, panther, eagle, elk, and white wolf. Special symbols include a golden coin, required to activate the bonus game, and a sunset landscape that serves as the wild symbol.

Buffalo offers up to 1024 paylines and five reels with four symbols each, making it easier to create winning combinations. The wild symbol, Sunset Landscape, will appear on reels 2, 3, and 4 to complete any unsuccessful combinations. The scatter, the Golden Coin, can appear anywhere on the reels, granting you access to the bonus game with three, four, or five coins. Depending on the number of scatters, you can have 5 to 20 free initial spins, which can be infinitely reactivated if additional gold coins appear during their execution. You also have several multipliers during free spins, as the wild symbol will give you a variable multiplier of x2 or x3 that adds to your winnings. And lastly, you can try your luck by doubling or quadrupling your bet by guessing the color or suit of a hidden card through the slot's Gamble feature.

Buffalo is a fascinating game full of multipliers and a good bonus for free spins, thanks to the high number of paylines. Other Aristocrat games with similar mechanics include Frogs and Flies and Lost Temple, both of which offer 1024 paylines like Buffalo.

response.headline: Gameplay mechanics
response.content: Buffalo has five reels and four symbols each, with an impressive 1024 paylines that makes it easy to create winning combinations. The wild symbol appears on reels 2, 3, and 4 and serves to complete any unsuccessful combinations. The Golden Coin, the scatter symbol, can appear anywhere on the reels and grant access to the bonus game with 3, 4, or 5 coins. The slot machine features multipliers that can multiply your winnings up to x3.

response.headline: Symbols and graphics
response.content: Buffalo's graphics are meticulously designed with a focus on attention to detail. As a result, the game sets the standard for high-quality visuals, which Aristocrat ensures in all its products. The slot machine's symbols feature iconic animals common in the North American territories, including a bison, panther, eagle, elk, and white wolf. The Golden Coin is a special symbol required to trigger the bonus game, while the wild symbol is represented by a beautiful sunset landscape.

response.headline: Bonus features
response.content: Buffalo slot machine offers players numerous bonus features, including the exciting free initial spins triggered by the Golden Coin scatter symbol. Depending on the number of scatters, you can earn 5 to 20 free initial spins that can be reactivated indefinitely if more coins appear during execution. During free spins, multipliers are applied through the wild symbol, which can give you a variable multiplier of x2 or x3 on your winnings. Finally, the Gamble feature allows you to double or even quadruple your winnings by guessing the color or suit of a hidden card.

response.headline: Paylines
response.content: With an impressive 1024 paylines, Buffalo is among the most generous slot machines in the Aristocrat stable. These numerous paylines provide plenty of opportunities for players to form winning combinations on every spin. The high number of paylines also makes Buffalo perfect for mid and high-stakes players, providing a range of betting options to suit all players' preferences and budgets.

response.headline: Similar games
response.content: Aristocrat is famous for producing slot machines with similar mechanics to Buffalo. Two of the most popular are Frogs and Flies and Lost Temple, both featuring the same 1024 paylines as in Buffalo slot machine. These games offer a range of betting options, bonus features, multipliers, and free spins, providing opportunities for players to maximize their winnings.

response.headline: Bonus Features:

Gameplay mechanics

Buffalo has five reels and four symbols each, with an impressive 1024 paylines that makes it easy to create winning combinations. The Golden Coin is a special symbol required to trigger the bonus game, while the wild symbol is represented by a beautiful sunset landscape.

Bonus features

Buffalo slot machine offers players numerous bonus features, including the exciting free initial spins triggered by the Golden Coin scatter symbol. Depending on the number of scatters, you can earn 5 to 20 free initial spins that can be reactivated indefinitely if more coins appear during execution. During free spins, multipliers are applied through the wild symbol, which can give you a variable multiplier of x2 or x3 on your winnings. Finally, the Gamble feature allows you to double or even quadruple your winnings by guessing the color or suit of a hidden card.

Paylines

With an impressive 1024 paylines, Buffalo is among the most generous slot machines in the Aristocrat stable. These numerous paylines provide plenty of opportunities for players to form winning combinations on every spin. The high number of paylines also makes Buffalo perfect for mid and high-stakes players, providing a range of betting options to suit all players' preferences and budgets.

Review:
 
Buffalo slot machine

Buffalo is a popular slot machine game developed by Aristocrat, known for producing high-quality and fun-to-play slots in the online casino industry. It takes players on a journey through the American prairies, populated by iconic animals that symbolize the North American continent. The game has 5 reels with 4 symbols each and an incredible 1024 paylines that make creating winning combinations effortless.

Gameplay and design

Aristocrat's commitment to producing high-quality products is reflected in Buffalo's graphics and sound design. The slot's meticulously crafted symbols bring to life the North American wildlife that the game celebrates. Players will be fascinated by the background music, sound effects, and animations that immerse them in the game's theme. Buffalo's gameplay is smooth and uncomplicated, making it an excellent game for players of any level, including novices.

Symbols and paylines

The symbols in Buffalo are the American Bison, panther, eagle, elk, white wolf, a wild symbol representing the sunset landscape, and a golden scatter coin symbol that activates the bonus game. The American Bison is the highest-paying symbol in the game and also doubles as a stacked symbol. The wild symbol replaces other symbols to create winning paylines easier. With 1024 paylines available, Buffalo allows players to create many winning combinations.

Bonus game and free spins

Buffalo has an exciting bonus game that's triggered by the golden coin scatter symbol. Players can activate the bonus game with three, four, or five scatter symbols, which will grant them between 8 to 20 free spins. If additional gold coins appear during their execution, the free spins can be infinitely reactivated. Players also have several multipliers, including a wild symbol multiplier of x2 or x3, increasing their chances of winning during free spins.

Gamble feature

Buffalo has a gamble feature where players can choose to double or quadruple their winnings by correctly guessing the color or suit of a hidden card drawn from a deck. Players should be aware that this feature is risky, and getting the guesses wrong can result in the loss of all winnings. This feature is optional and not required to trigger any bonus games or free spins.

Review: Experience an unforgettable adventure with the Buffalo slot machine. Produced by Aristocrat, a historical and innovative software development house committed to the slot machine and online casino industry. This game will take you on a journey through the American prairies, where you will encounter the typical animals that inhabit these areas. The American Bison, an animal that has been on the brink of extinction during European colonization, is the main character of the game and the highest-paying symbol. With 1024 paylines, you will have no trouble creating excellent winning combinations.

The graphics of the game are meticulously designed, highlighting the attention to detail Aristocrat invests in ensuring high-quality products that are fun and entertaining. The symbols in the slot are iconic animals that populate the North American territories, including a bison, panther, eagle, elk, and white wolf. Special symbols include a golden coin, required to activate the bonus game, and a sunset landscape that serves as the wild symbol.

Buffalo offers up to 1024 paylines and five reels with four symbols each, making it easier to create winning combinations. The wild symbol, Sunset Landscape, will appear on reels 2, 3, and 4 to complete any unsuccessful combinations. The scatter, the Golden Coin, can appear anywhere on the reels, granting you access to the bonus game with three, four, or five coins. Depending on the number of scatters, you can have 5 to 20 free initial spins, which can be infinitely reactivated if additional gold coins appear during their execution. You also have several multipliers during free spins, as the wild symbol will give you a variable multiplier of x2 or x3 that adds to your winnings. And lastly, you can try your luck by doubling or quadrupling your bet by guessing the color or suit of a hidden card through the slot's Gamble feature.

Buffalo is a fascinating game full of multipliers and a good bonus for free spins, thanks to the high number of paylines. Other Aristocrat games with similar mechanics include Frogs and Flies and Lost Temple, both of which offer 1024 paylines like Buffalo.
